nextgen.core.alignment
Interface Alignment

All Superinterfaces:
Annotation, java.lang.Comparable<Annotation>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractPairedEndAlignment, FragmentAlignment, PairedReadAlignment, SingleEndAlignment
public interface Alignment
extends Annotation

Based on the Alignment interface in IGV. This interface represents any read or pair of reads aligned to the genome

Author:
skadri

boolean isChimera()
